name: Cabinet Commas
description: Add thousands separators (commas) to the market sell and retrieve tabs for readability.

name: Classic Chat
description: Theme the chat window to be more similar to a classic MMO chat. Includes features such as timestamps, custom colors per channel, HTTP links and more. This addon is not compatible with LKChat.

name: Context Menu Additions
description: Add more options to the context menus (right click) on actors and on chat messages, such as character info, report and block, clear sender messages, etc.

name: Fix Font Size Slider
description: Fix the font size slider to dynamically update the font size in the chat window.

name: Item Drops
description: Show effects on items that are on the ground, similar to Diablo III style, for you and your party members' loot. Also allows items to show their name tag, as if you were holding ALT constantly, immediately as they are dropped. Chat messages and other features available, see slash command: /drops

name: Now Playing
description: Display the currently playing BGM above the chat window. Various options available, such as 'notify mode' when the track changes, etc. Slash commands available: /np help

name: Remove FPS Counter
description: Removes the FPS counter. The fps counter can be toggled with: /fps

name: Remove Map Background
description: Removes the grey dimming background when the map is opened.

name: Remove TP Button
description: Hides the TP button and replaces it with the slash command: /tp

name: Remove Whisper Switch
description: Stops the chat window from automatically switching to whisper rooms upon receiving a whisper.

name: Toggle Duels
description: Allows you to toggle whether or not you may recieve duel requests. Available slash commands: /duels help
